name: Mazemerizzz
description:
Action! Adventure! DEATH! (Well, sometimes) Fun! Fear! Rewards! Puzzles! Traps! AND TORCHES!

Moe decided to take a nap in the wrong place and now she's stuck in her own dream. She's a gamer so you can imagine what she's trapped herself with. Can you navigate her through all ten levels to escape the evil eye and wake up? Jump, sprint, run and walk through various traps and obstacles. Use real time reaction to get past truly chaotic dangers. Interact with various puzzles to find the solution. Change from Third to First person anytime. Toggle help on/off for a more immersive experience.
Prepare to delve into a fantasy realm of Moe's mind with puzzles, mazes and platforming like you've never experienced before. Each level is unique with it's own diabolic and twisted traps and they become progressively more difficult. Finish with 37 hearts for a perfect game.
With NVIDIA DLSS for all RTX cards and Frame Rate Generation for RTX 4 Series cards. Currently keyboard and mouse only. No controller support.
